item.title: Writeup ITNSA 2021 - Network Actual & Future Network
item.description: Table Of Contents Task 1 HQ MATARAM Server Configuration Completed Points: 8% Task 2 HQ MATARAM Router Configuration Completed Points: 19% Task 3 SW_HQ_L1 Switch Configuration at HQ MATARAM Completed Points: 5% Task 4 SW_HQ_L2 Switch Configuration on HQ MATARAM Completed Points: 3% Task 5 Admin2 PC Configuration and Verification at HQ MATARAM Completed Points: 0% Task 6 Wireless Controller (WLC) Configuration at HQ MATARAM Completed Points: 8% Task 7 LeighWeight Access Point (LWAP) Configuration at HQ MATARAM Completed Points: 0% Task 8 End Device Configuration and Verification on HRD and MARKETING VLANs at HQ MATARAM Completed Points: 0% Task 9 BRANCH SUMBAWA Server Configuration Completed Points: 10% Task 10 BRANCH SUMBAWA Router Configuration Completed Points: 11% Task 11 SW_BRANCH Switch Configuration at BRANCH SUMBAWA Completed Points: 3% Task 12 DHCP Client Configuration and Internet Connection Verification on VLAN 2 SALES PC at BRANCH SUMBAWA Completed Points: 0% Task 13 WRT_BRANCH Wireless Router Configuration at BRANCH SUMBAWA Completed Points: 4% Task 14 End Device Configuration and Verification at WLAN ENGINEER BRANCH SUMBAWA Completed Points: 2% Task 15 VPN Configuration on an HQ MATARAM Router utilizing GRE over IPSec and OSPF Completed Points: 8% Task 16 VPN Configuration on an BRANCH SUMBAWA Router utilizing GRE over IPSec and OSPF Completed Points: 8% Task 17 VPN Connection Verification from the End Device at HQ MATARAM Completed Points: 0% Task 18 VPN Connection Verification from the End Device at BRANCH SUMBAWA Completed Points: 0% Task 19 Roled Based Access Control (RBAC) configuration at router HQ MATARAM Completed Points: 1% Task 20 Roled Based Access Control (RBAC) configuration at router BRANCH SUMBAWA Completed Points: 1% Complete Configuration Router HQ MATARAM Router BRANCH SUMBAWA Summary Introduction So I was bored on the internet, looking for information about CCNA lab questions, when I came upon the 2021 LKS (Student Competency Competition) questions published by ITNSA.
